title: Leeds United Live: Doncaster Rovers v Leeds United As it happened - BBC News
summary: lewis cook gave leeds an early lead with his first goal for the club .
andy williams levels from the spot before cook is show red for a poor challenge on aaron taylor-sinclair .
no goals in the second half sends the game to extra time .
sam byram and chris wood miss their efforts as doncaster go through 4-2 .

documents.title: goodnight
text: so that 's it .
for the first time in their history leeds united have been knocked out of the league cup in the first round .
hear more from leeds united head coach uwe rosler
you 'll be able to listen to the game on bbc radio leeds and follow the action here with build up from 14:00 bst .
thanks for joining us .

documents.title: rosler continued
text: `` for their goal we made two mistakes in a row and it ended with the penalty to them .
`` i wanted someone to sit in midfield and control the game and i thought scott did well .
`` i would n't have changed the team selection especially when you see we 've got another game in three days . ''

documents.title: more rosler thoughts
text: `` i have no complaints about the effort but we lost our heads a little bit , '' he told bbc radio leeds .
`` we had too many penalties and red cards last season and we have fallen back into it .
`` lewis acted rashly and ultimately it cost us the game . ''

documents.title: rosler 's thoughts
text: rosler felt he learnt a lot about his players tonight .
daft mistakes cost the match & over exuberance from cook after his goal .
rosler pleased with turnbull in particular .
he was pleased antenucci lasted 120 mins too .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: reading next up
text: the royals are looking for their first league win of the season after going down 2-1 at birmingham city last saturday .
steve clarke 's men will have had an extra 48 hours to prepare for the game after they beat colchester 1-0 , in 120 minutes , on tuesday .
you 'll be able to listen to the game on bbc radio leeds and follow the action here with build up from 14:00 bst .

documents.title: get in touch
text: sam brooksbank
tom mooring
what did you make of leeds united 's first ever league cup first round exit ?
get in touch with us on twitter
@ twitterid antenucci really should be starting one of the only players we have who makes things happen
@ twitterid not happy leeds are out but do n't think we deserved to win .
red card was the key but think we would have won the game with 11 men .

documents.title: cook decision was right
text: it was n't a malicious challenge from lewis cook but it was mistimed and it was the right decision .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: sending off was pivotal
text: they stood firm with 10 men and they looked the fitter and stronger of the two but it was just one of those nights .
the sending off let them get into the game and mistakes crept into out game .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: get in touch
text: shane chambers
matthew chilvers
what did you make of leeds united 's first ever league cup first round exit ?
get in touch with us on twitter
@ twitterid why play people in a position they do n't normally .
plenty of players that would have done better than wootton .
long drive home ! !

documents.title: turnbull to keep number one shirt ?
text: ross turnbull has not done too much wrong this evening .
his distribution was great to see and he will be putting pressure on marco silvestri for the number one jersey .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: get in touch
text: jemma richmond
dean senior
what did you make of leeds united 's first ever league cup first round exit ?
get in touch with us on twitter
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid great effort lads , but shocking 2 pens # mot onwards & upwards we are leeds

documents.title: doncaster win 4-2 on penalties
text: in the midst of all that sam byram and chris wood hit two of the worst penalties you could wish to see .
wood 's penalty nearly cleared the stand .
you have to hope that miss does n't hit his confidence too much with leeds likely to be reliant on his goals this season .

documents.title: doncaster win 4-2 on penalties
text: it 's disappointing when you 've got through extra-time and you 've gone to penalties .
that 's the way it goes and we have to look ahead to reading on sunday now .
there 's no point feeling sorry for yourselves .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster win 4-2 on penalties
text: leeds go to their fans battered and bruised .
we 're deflated and leeds are out .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: doncaster rovers are through on penalties
text: doncaster rovers are through on penalties

documents.title: wellens scores ! 4-2
text: doncaster go through to the next round .

documents.title: wood misses ! 3-2
text: if united 's last one was baggio , this is chris waddle .
leeds on the brink of going out .

documents.title: forrester scores ! 3-2
text: keeper goes the right way this time but the penalty is too high for him to reach .

documents.title: byram misses ! 2-2
text: sam byram 's roberto baggio moment .
he 's blazed it over .

documents.title: williams scores ! 2-2
text: keeper goes wrong yet again .
slotted home .

documents.title: murphy scores ! 2-1
text: keeper goes wrong again .
top corner .

documents.title: tyson scores ! 1-1
text: blasts down the centre .
we 're level .

documents.title: antenucci scores ! 1-0
text: keeper goes the wrong way .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: pick your spot and stick with it .
if you are unsure then more often than not you 'll miss it .
i never really took them as a player .
gary mcallister did that for us and he generally did a good job of it .
the situation wo n't face ross turnbull in the slightest .
he 'll be looking to be the hero .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds unitedpenalties
text: eight championship teams have been knocked out by lower league opposition in the first round of this season 's league cup .
if leeds are to avoid becoming the ninth they 'll need to do the business from the spot .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: i wonder what lewis cook is thinking right now ?
the 19-year-old gave leeds the lead in this game so long ago it now feels like yesterday but was then sent off before half-time for a very poor challenge .
how different could tonight have been but for that moment of madness ?

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds force a corner in a rare foray forward but chris wood fouls his man and penalties are looking ever more likely .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: is it going to be a moment of brilliance ?
is someone going to be the hero out there tonight ?
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: if we get a sight of goal then i think we should take it .
it 's getting pretty slippy out there and if you take a chance you do n't know what might happen .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: doncaster push on but ca n't create a real shooting opportunity .
uwe rosler will be pleased with how his side have soaked up the pressure this evening especially given that skipper and centre-half sol bamba has been given the night off .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: doncaster just enjoying a bit of possession at the start of this half .
feel like i 've written that before
both teams know that a mistake at this stage is likely to be crucial .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: and that 's your lot for the first period of extra-time .
fifteen minutes for one of the teams to find a winner .
can doncaster make their extra man count or will one leeds ' subs make the difference ?

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: miroc antenucci nearly proved adam right in the strangest of ways .
the italian dribbled into the area , created some space for a shot that thorsten stuckmann fumbled onto the post before grabbing before it could cross the line .
as close as either side have come in a while and the game is really opening up now .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: the 10 men of leeds are still looking fit enough to win this game .
could it take a bit of magic from antenucci ?
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds come back at the hosts and win themselves a couple of corners .
liam cooper blazes wildly over while the second comes to nothing .
considering both teams have some really good headers of the ball i have to say that the set-piece delivery has not been the greatest this evening .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: unsurprisingly given that they 've had a spare man for the majority of the evening the doncaster midfielders are still looking to break forward .
james coppinger tees up richie wellens on the edge of the area but he miscues his effort high and wide .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: it will be interesting to know what uwe rosler and paul dickov make of having to play 120 minutes in the first week of the season .
the pace has slowed slightly but both teams are still looking for what could well be the winner .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: we have just what everybody wants in the first round of the league cup extra-time .
the hosts had a real go at the 10 men of leeds in the last 15 minutes of that half but leeds do look ok lively on the counter .
30 more minutes of action awaits and after that the spectre of a penalty shoot-out .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: i think noel could well be right across the board there .
three minutes of injury time for either side to find a winner and doncaster have a free-kick in an attacking position on the right hand side after charlie taylor is penalised for handball .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: it 's been exciting and it 's been a good contest .
it could be a late one now and uwe rosler will not want that .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: doncaster are getting closer now .
nathan tyson just fails to meet a knock down from andy williams before forcing a save from turnbull moments later .
harry forrester thrashes the rebound high and wide .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: more pressure from doncaster with james coppinger 's deflected cross just about beating everyone in the box before harry forrester sends a low drive straight at turnbull after his corner was cleared out to him .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: we 've got to be a bit more patient and a bit cleverer with the ball now .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: brilliant tackle from charlie taylor on nathan tyson after the veteran forward had motored his way into the area .
he had to time that perfectly and he did .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds fans are feeling hard done by tonight .
they 're giving big cheers whenever they do get a decision in their favour but i think the referee has got most of the big calls right tonight .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: sam byram has now joined the action for leeds , with alex mowatt making way .
he 's brought some gels on to the pitch for a couple of the players .
presumably they did n't manage to get any jaffa cakes at the break .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: not to be undone paul dickov has now brought on striker nathan tyson for full-back cedric evina .
centre-back rob jones has just joined the attack but his header is straight at turnbull .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: for all their possession and pressure doncaster have n't really threatened too much since lewis cook was shown red .
rosler 's substitutions look more like those of a man who thinks his team can do this in 90 minutes rather than one looking to hang on for extra-time .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds unitedsubstitutions
text: leeds weather another spell of doncaster pressure and here come the subs .
stuart dallas makes way for chris wood and souleymane doukara is replaced by the returning luke murphy .
dallas has been industrious while doukara has been well , quiet .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: i think they 'll think about making change with 30 minutes remaining .
i can see chris wood warming up and it looks like he is coming on .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: well done stuart dallas .
the northern irishman has just put in a brilliant 30-yard sprint to force a corner for his side after a concerted spell of doncaster pressure .
it comes to nothing but leeds will need plenty more of that from the former brentford man if they 're to progress tonight .
down at the other end , ross turnbull denies andy williams again as the ex-swindon man looks to double his tally .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: the leeds fans have travelled in good numbers and they make up 3,394 of the 8,361 attendance at the keepmoat stadium .
their 10 men are going to need to produce something here if they 're to be sent home happy .
it 's all doncaster at the moment .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: doncaster force a couple of corners in quick succession .
the visitors clear both away comfortably enough but ca n't create anything on the counter-attack .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds are dropping into a 4-4-1 when they lose the ball but they 're trying to get forward as much as they can when they have possession .
i 'd rather see us play a bit longer now .
let 's turn them and squeeze them .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds head coach uwe rosler will not want to be the first man to see the club lose a first round tie in the league cup .
he does have options on the bench with sam byram and chris wood and i would n't be surprised if we do see a change quite soon .
no changes from either side right now and we 're back underway .

yorkshire post 's richard sutcliffe

rovers giving the impression that this is theirs to win now .
leeds good for half an hour , imploded since then .

he 's fucking woeful

text: brian mcdaid
stuart barnett
what do you think ?

high tempo + lots of shots ?

shame about cook @ twitterid @ twitterid looked like he overcooked his tackle ! !

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: the half ends with doncaster clearing an alex mowatt free-kick to safety .
leeds have never lost a first round tie in the league cup but they are going to have to do it the hard way now that goalscorer lewis cook has been sent off .
cook , who gave the visitors the lead with his first goal for the club , was sent off for a poor challenge after andy williams had levelled the scores from the spot .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: you 'd imagine leeds are just looking to get in level at half-time now and re-organise .
they 'd been trying to really press the man on the ball before the red card but they 're already dropping further back now they 're a man down .
james coppinger fires narrowly wide as we enter injury-time .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: we 've got to get through the whole of the second half a man light now .
the mistakes had been creeping in and it feels a bit like classic leeds united .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: lewis cook sent off ! doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: leeds are down to 10 men and it 's the goalscorer who has been sent off .
the teenager ( right ) over-ran the ball and went in two-footed on home defender aaron taylor-sinclair .
no complaints from the leeds man as he follows up his first goal for the club with his first red card .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: that goal has given the hosts a real boost and they 're looking a bit more enterprising when they get on the ball now .
ex-swindon man williams forced another save from turnbull straight after his goal .
the league one side are very much in this .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: we need to cut out these silly mistakes .
we 're dwelling on the ball in the wrong areas and ultimately the penalty came from us making bad decisions near our own area .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: goal ! doncaster rovers 1-1 leeds united
text: doncaster striker andy williams levels for the hosts from the spot after scott wootton had bundled cedric evina over in the area .
noel said he was concerned about the former manchester united man playing in that position and with challenges like that it 's easy to see why .
ross turnbull went the right way but could n't quite stop it squirming in .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: that 's a great kick forward from turnbull , even though it has n't come to anything .
his distribution has been good and it makes a real difference when you have a keeper like that .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: uwe rosler has just come to the edge of his area to give some real encouragement after a quick passing move saw leeds almost get in down the right .
that 's what he wants to see .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: very nearly 1-1 .
some less than textbook defending ends with the ball bouncing through for doncaster midfielder james coppinger .
he lifts the ball over the onrushing ross turnbull but giuseppe bellusci does brilliantly to get back on the line and hook the ball to safety .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: katherine
that 'll do .
cook gets the opening goal for leeds # drfc 0-1 # lufc cue huge rendition of # mot @ twitterid
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid have got some away following
author: Katherine Hannah
Sports Presenter, BBC Radio Leeds

documents.title: monkey off the back for cookdoncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: even though he 's playing in more of a holding role you still want to chip in with some goals and that will have done lewis cook the world of good .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: goal ! doncaster rovers 0-1 leeds united
text: mirco antenucci got away down the left , where a lot of leeds ' best work has come so far .
the italian cut inside and forced a save from thorsten stuckmann but lewis cook was on hand to tap it into an empty net for his first goal for the club .
a solid start just became a great one .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-0 leeds united
text: there 's not been a lot in it so far .
harry forrester sent a dangerous free-kick to the back post that leeds skipper liam cooper did well to deal with .
both sides are still looking to feel their way into the game .

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-0 leeds united
text: leeds are looking bright and sharp and they 're forcing doncaster back when they have the ball .
they 're working very hard so far .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: doncaster rovers 0-0 leeds united
text: nice couple of moves by leeds down the left-hand side both end with corners but they ca n't force a meaningful chance from either .

documents.title: can you help noel ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: noel 's been informed that he scored for leeds in a league cup tie at sunderland in 1993 .
apparently he has absolutely no recollection of it but thinks it might well have been a 40-yard volley
can any of you help re-jog noel 's memory ?
were you there ?
get in touch with us on twitter

documents.title: kick-offdoncaster rovers 0-0 leeds united
text: leeds , in their fetching new yellow kit , will be shooting towards their fans in the second half .
and we 're underway .

documents.title: gaining momentumdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: getting a good win and a few goals under our belt will be a massive confidence boost for all the players .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: end of the hockdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: uwe rosler will want to win for a number of reasons this evening .
not least because last season 's second round league cup exit at
the man who said he wanted to take the club to the champions league is now

documents.title: safe passage awaits ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: doncaster had a very strong pre-season before
it appears rovers have gone for experience in terms of recruitment this summer with richard chaplow and gary mckenzie arriving .
they still have a core of players who know the club and lower leagues very well like james coppinger and richie wellens .
that being said , i do n't see them troubling leeds tonight .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: get in touchdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: can leeds continue their fine recent form against doncaster ?
can mirco antenucci up where he left off against burnley ?
will noel 's goal celebrations finally see him find his way onto the pitch ?
stick with us here and listen to the match on bbc radio leeds on 92.4 fm , dab & freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can progress to the second round .
let us know what you think by getting in touch on twitter

documents.title: good omens ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: thanks to our friends at opta for these gems that should give leeds fans some confidence for tonight 's game :
the is the third time in five seasons that doncaster have hosted leeds in a league cup tie - the previous two have both been won by the whites .
leeds have won all 12 of their previous first round ties in the history of the league cup .

documents.title: beware the giantkillersdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: leeds will be looking to avoid the fate of eight of their championship rivals who have suffered
derby became the latest to suffer the ignominy when they were

documents.title: tough early schedule for leedsdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: it 's not ideal having to play three games in six days .
i suppose it 's better to have this kind of run of games at this stage of the season rather than later on .
having this game tonight has totally thrown my whole week off !
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: friends reunited ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: rovers boss paul dickov and uwe rosler go back a long way having played together at manchester city in the 90s .
rosler classes the former leeds loanee dickov as a good friend and an able manager .
he even turned up at wembley in may 99 to watch dickov score a dramatic late equaliser in the division two play-off final versus gillingham which city eventually won on penalties .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: video previewdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: just under 30 minutes until kick-off now .
maybe adam can use the time to improve his 'selfie game ' ?

documents.title: taylor happy with new set-updoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: leeds full-back charlie taylor spoke to bbc radio leeds ' adam pope before today 's game .
the full-back is enjoying playing in tandem with summer signing stuart dallas and says the team are benefitting from a smaller squad .
`` it 's a smaller squad so everyone is in and around it now , '' he said .
`` it 's a tighter group and maybe a happier group so hopefully that can carry on all season . ''

documents.title: best league cup memoriesdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: i 've been asking fans for their best memories of leeds in the league cup .
here 's a few of the responses so far :

documents.title: wootton the wanderer ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: we saw on saturday that scott wootton came on and played in that holding role .
i 'm not sure that i agree with it .
we could have put luke murphy in there because his range of passing is better .
i felt we lost momentum on saturday with wootton playing in there .
i do n't think it 's his best position .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: positive vibes
text: after a great performance against possible championship title contenders burnley it 's important leeds keep the positive vibe going against doncaster tonight .
rosler feels a deep responsibility to deliver a performance for the fans and i fancy leeds to do the business tonight .
there 's a few curveballs in the team selection .
scott wootton looks like he 's going to be playing a holding midfield role which could be interesting .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: team newsdoncaster rovers v leeds united
text: let 's crack straight on with the team news shall we ?
uwe rosler has made five changes to the team that started saturday 's 1-1 draw with burnley .
goalscorer mirco antenucci is rewarded for his goal on saturday with a place in the starting xi while goalkeeper ross turnbull comes in for his debut .
leeds united starting xi : turnbull , berardi , bellusci , cooper , taylor , wootton , cook , mowatt , doukara , dallas , antenucci .
doncaster rovers xi : stuckmann , mccullough , butler , jones , taylor-sinclair , evina , wellens , middleton , forrester , coppinger , williams

documents.title: up for the cup ? doncaster rovers v leeds united
text: good evening and welcome to tonight 's live text coverage of doncaster rovers v leeds united in the capital one cup .
the competition is seen as a bit of a nuisance by some but uwe rosler will be desperate to get his first competitive win as leeds head coach tonight .
stick with us here and listen to the match on bbc radio leeds on 92.4 fm , dab & freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can progress to the second round .
